>>Hydroelectric dams utilize:<< ( ) only kinetic energy ( ) only potential energy ( ) only chemical energy (x) both potential and kinetic energy ( ) both chemical and potential energy
[explanation] Hydroelectric dams generate electricity through both potential and kinetic energy: the potential energy of the water built up behind the dam, and the kinetic energy of the water turning the turbine and generating electricity. [explanation]
